About Me_

hi, i am imran molla joy. i am a front-end developer. i am strong in web design. i design ui/ux. i make 2d/3d art and assets for video games.i have deep knowledge in color theory and color combinations.

i make games. i'm good at programming logic. my primary programming language is c# and javascript.
